Dynamic Segment v4 object

Dynamic Segment v4 object

dynamicSegment(name, userSegment, sessionSegment)

Arguments

name

Name of dynamic segment
userSegment

userSegment to include in the segment
sessionSegment

sessionSegment to include in the segment
